turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I was hoping that you could help me order some pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure! how many pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to need three large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The first one, I want a Hawaiian Special. The second one, I want a Tijuana Special. And the third one, I just want a Classic.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it. what type of crusts would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to need a gluten-free crust for all three of those.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any other special instruction?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I'll be picking them up, though.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so 3 large pizzas. a hawaiian special, a tijuana special and a classic. all three are gluten free. did i get it right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, those are all large, right? You said large?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: correct. 3 large pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Got it. Okay, perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. your total is $42.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. About when will they be ready?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup at bela luna's in 50 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, that's perfect. Got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great! enjoy! byebye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.
